Card Description: provide free cooked meals (home Delivery available) for those listed as eligible by the local governing body and lunch packets at Rs.20 for anyone who requires cooked meals; numbers available in the links
Eligibilty (if any): Persons eligible for free meals: 1. individuals enlisted in the Ashraya scheme; 2. homeless people rehabilitated in relief camps by the local bodies; 3. migrant labourers; 4. bed-ridden patients; 5. poor elderly persons (unable to cook for themselves); 6. persons living in tribal settlements; 7. families of children in BUDS school; 8. persons in care homes; 9  destitutes who did not receive 15 kg rice distribted by the civil supplies cooperation
